00041 class ParameterList : public VParameterNode{
00042 public:
00044   ParameterList(const std::string& key="", const std::string& helptext="") : 
00045     VParameterNode(key, helptext) { _node_type = PARAMETER_LIST; }
00047   virtual ~ParameterList();
00048 protected:
00050   ParameterList(const ParameterList& right);
00052   ParameterList& operator=(const ParameterList& right);
00053 public:
00055   virtual void InitializeParameterList(){}
00056 
00058   virtual std::istream& ReadFrom( std::istream& in, bool single=false);
00060   virtual std::ostream& WriteTo( std::ostream& out , int indent=0);
00062   virtual int PrintHelp(const std::string& myname="") const;
00064   template<class T> int RegisterParameter(const std::string& key, T& par,
00065                                           const std::string& helptext="");
00067   template<class R, class W> 
00068   int RegisterFunction(const std::string& key,
00069                        const R& read, 
00070                        const W& write,
00071                        const std::string& helptext="");
00073   template<class R> int RegisterReadFunction(const std::string& key, 
00074                                              const R& read,
00075                                              const std::string& helptext="");
00077   template<class W> int RegisterWriteFunction(const std::string& key, 
00078                                               const W& write,
00079                                               const std::string& helptext="");
00081   VParameterNode* const GetParameter(const std::string& key);
00082 protected:
00084   typedef std::map<std::string, VParameterNode*> ParMap;
00085   ParMap _parameters;   
00086   
00088   std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<VParameterNode> > _deleter; 
00089   
00091   template<class T> 
00092   int RegisterParameterImp(const std::string& key, T& par, 
00093                            const std::string& helptext,
00094                            const boost::false_type&);
00096   template<class T>

00098                            const std::string& helptext, 
00099                            const boost::true_type&);

00101 
00102 template<class T>
00103 inline int ParameterList::RegisterParameter(const std::string& key,
00104                                             T& par,
00105                                             const std::string& helptext)
00106 {
00107   if( _parameters.find(key) != _parameters.end() ){
00108     Message(ERROR)<<"Parameter with key \""<<key
00109              <<"\" already exists in this list!"<<std::endl;
00110     return -1;
00111   }
00112   
00113   return RegisterParameterImp(key,par,helptext,
00114                               boost::is_base_of<VParameterNode,T>());
00115 }
00116 
00117 //template specialization
00118 template<class T>
00119 inline int ParameterList::RegisterParameterImp(const std::string& key, 
00120                                                T& par,
00121                                                const std::string& helptext,
00122                                                const boost::true_type&)
00123 {
00124   _parameters.insert(std::make_pair(key,&par));
00125   return 0;
00126 }
00127 
00128 template<class T> 
00129 inline int ParameterList::RegisterParameterImp(const std::string& key,
00130                                                T& par,
00131                                                const std::string& helptext,
00132                                                const boost::false_type&)
00133 {
00134   boost::shared_ptr<VParameterNode> ptr(new Parameter<T>(par, key, helptext) );
00135   _deleter.push_back(ptr);
00136   _parameters.insert(std::make_pair(key,ptr.get()));
00137   return 0;
00138 }
00139 
00140 template<class R, class W>
00141 inline int ParameterList::RegisterFunction(const std::string& key,
00142                                            const R& reader, const W& writer,
00143                                            const std::string& helptext)
00144 {
00145   if( _parameters.find(key) != _parameters.end() ){
00146     Message(ERROR)<<"Parameter with key \""<<key
00147              <<"\" already exists in this list!"<<std::endl;
00148     return -1;
00149   }
00150   
00151   boost::shared_ptr<VParameterNode> 
00152     ptr(new ConfigFunctor<R,W>(reader, writer, key, helptext));
00153   _deleter.push_back(ptr);
00154   _parameters.insert(std::make_pair(key, ptr.get()));
00155   return 0;
00156 }
00157 
00158 template<class R>
00159 inline int ParameterList::RegisterReadFunction(const std::string& key,
00160                                                const R& reader,
00161                                                const std::string& helptext)
00162 {
00163   return RegisterFunction(key, reader, ConfigFunctorDummyWrite(), helptext);
00164 }
00165 
00166 template<class W>
00167 inline int ParameterList::RegisterWriteFunction(const std::string& key,
00168                                                 const W& writer,
00169                                                 const std::string& helptext)
00170 {
00171   return RegisterFunction(key, ConfigFunctorDummyRead(), writer, helptext);
00172 }
